commit.message: chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v4.1.3

afterCommit.message: chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v4.1.3

commit.message:
types: differentiate undefined and void promises

in typescript 4.1 promises that return no value at all (void) are treated different than promises that return some value (including null and undefined).
this change ensures that promises consistently use void or undefined where appropriate for empty resolves.

nodes.bodyText: here a value can sometimes be returned (from a different resolve in the same promise), so an explicit undefined is passed.
here no value is ever sent, so void can be used.
